content.text: I love filming. I'm obsessed with it. I would love to be a filmmaker one day.
That's great! I'm sure you'd be a great filmmaker. What kind of films do you like to make?
I like to make short films. I like to tell stories about people's lives.
That's great. I love watching short films. They're so intimate and personal.
Me too. I love how they can capture a moment in time and tell a story in a very short amount of time.
I agree. What's your favorite short film?
My favorite short film is called "The Lunch Date." It's about a man who meets a woman at a restaurant and they have a conversation. It's a very simple story, but it's very powerful.
I've never heard of that one, but I'll have to check it out.
You should. It's a great film.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to put a smile on peoples faces. I love making people laugh.
That's great! I love making people laugh too. It's one of the best feelings in the world.
Me too. I love when I can make someone laugh so hard that they cry.
I know what you mean. It's the best feeling.
So, what do you do for fun?
I work on Wall Street, but I actually like wearing suits and ties. I love smooth jazz and I have a poodle named Nanette.
That's great! I love smooth jazz too. I've never had a poodle, but they're so cute.
Yeah, they are. Nanette is a great dog.
I'm glad to hear that.
I'm glad we met.
Me too.
